segments.text: Those children are so clever in their cookie-stealing endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is a true acrobat, balancing on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar, pulling out the goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And his sister is ready, hand outstretched, a silent accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The "COOKIE JAR" label is so prominent, almost inviting their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must have timed this perfectly, while the woman is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic sibling partnership, working together for a common sweet goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet they feel a thrill of excitement and secrecy right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused, she has no idea what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost comical how oblivious she is to their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with their cookies before anyone notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their concentrated efforts are really quite impressive to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is what childhood memories are made of, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're taking quite a risk for those treats, though.
segments.speaker: PAR
